explore.name: Hike Mount Nittany
explore.desc: A classic, must-do hike for Penn Staters and visitors! The trailhead is in Lemont, PA, and the hike offers stunning views of Penn State campus and the valley from several overlooks, especially the Mike Lynch Overlook. Moderate to strenuous climb, well-marked paths.

explore.name: Penn State Arboretum
explore.desc: A beautiful, 370-acre garden and natural area open daily from dawn to dusk. Features the H.O. Smith Botanic Gardens, children's garden, pollinator and bird garden, walking trails, and seasonal events.

explore.name: Happy Valley Mini Golf
explore.desc: 18-hole course just 3 miles from Penn State. Fun for all ages! Group discounts available.

explore.name: Palmer Museum of Art
explore.desc: The largest art museum collection between Pittsburgh and Philadelphia, with world-class exhibitions and a diverse permanent collection. Free admission.

explore.name: Connections Clothing
explore.desc: A women's boutique in downtown State College, open since 1996. Handpicked, trendy pieces from brands like Free People, Just Black Denim, and Boys Lie.

explore.name: Bagel Love Cafe
explore.desc: Fresh bagels, breakfast sandwiches, and coffee in a cozy spot.

explore.name: Wegmans
explore.desc: Gourmet grocery store with a great prepared foods section.

explore.name: Barrel 21
explore.desc: Distillery and restaurant with creative cocktails and local fare.

explore.name: Tavern
explore.desc: Classic American restaurant, a State College staple.

explore.name: Champs
explore.desc: Sports bar with wings, burgers, and a lively atmosphere.

explore.name: Penn State Creamery
explore.desc: Legendary ice cream made on campus. Try the Peachy Paterno!

explore.name: Meyer Dairy
explore.desc: Family-run dairy with unique ice cream flavors and fresh milk.

explore.name: Sweet Frog
explore.desc: Self-serve frozen yogurt with tons of toppings.

explore.name: Yallah Hot Chicken
explore.desc: Spicy fried chicken sandwiches and loaded fries.

explore.name: Tadashi
explore.desc: Japanese ramen and sushi bar.

explore.name: Lupitas
explore.desc: Authentic Mexican food, tacos, and more.

explore.name: Duck Donuts
explore.desc: Warm, made-to-order donuts with custom toppings.

explore.name: Local Whiskey
explore.desc: Bar with a huge whiskey selection and upscale pub food.

explore.name: Central Reservation
explore.desc: Trendy spot for cocktails and small plates.

explore.name: Allen Street Grill
explore.desc: Upscale American dining with a view of downtown.

explore.name: Corner Room
explore.desc: Historic eatery serving classic American comfort food.

explore.name: Doggies
explore.desc: Hot dogs, fries, and late-night eats.

explore.name: Waffle Shop
explore.desc: Beloved breakfast spot for pancakes, waffles, and eggs.

explore.name: Breakfast on Boal
explore.desc: Charming breakfast and brunch cafe.

explore.name: Pump Station
explore.desc: Brewpub with craft beers and hearty food.

explore.name: Rothrock Coffee
explore.desc: Specialty coffee shop with pastries and a chill vibe.

explore.name: Happy Valley Brewing
explore.desc: Local brewery with creative beers and pub food.

explore.name: 814 Cider
explore.desc: Cider house with a variety of local ciders.

explore.name: Naked Egg
explore.desc: Popular breakfast and brunch spot.
